io.wcm.wcm.ui.extjs.provider

Class AbstractPageListProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • org.apache.sling.api.servlets.SlingSafeMethodsServlet
        • io.wcm.wcm.ui.extjs.provider.AbstractPageProvider
          • io.wcm.wcm.ui.extjs.provider.AbstractPageListProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @ConsumerType
public abstract class AbstractPageListProvider
extends AbstractPageProvider
    Exports the list of child pages of the addressed resource in JSON format to the response. This can be used by the io.wcm.wcm.ui.form.Selection widget. Abstract implementation, some methods can be overwritten by sublcasses.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
